1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Derived mix text.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.MixText.Deriv
6  ( mixTab,
7    mixTerms,
8    mixJudge,
9  ) where
10
11import Data.Monoid ((<>))
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.MixText.MixText         as B
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.MixText.MixClass        as B
14
15-- | Mix text tab character.
16--
17--   >>> B.mixString "a" `mixTab` B.mixString "b"
18--   MixText "a\tb"
19--
20mixTab :: B.MixText
21mixTab = B.mixChar '\t'
22
23-- | Join mix text list by separetor.
24--
25--   >>> mixJoin B.mix1 ["foo", "bar", "baz"]
26--   MixText "foo bar baz"
27--
28--   >>> mixJoin mixTab ["foo", "bar", "baz"]
29--   MixText "foo\tbar\tbaz\t"
30--
31mixJoin :: (B.Mix a, B.Mix b) => a -> [b] -> B.MixText
32mixJoin sep = loop where
33    loop [] = B.mixEmpty
34    loop (m:ms) = B.mix m <> B.mix sep <> loop ms
35
36-- | Concatenate terms of content.
37--
38--  >>> mixTerms B.mix2 [("a", "foo"), ("b", "bar")]
39--  MixText "/a foo  /b bar"
40--
41mixTerms :: (B.Mix sep,  B.Mix c) => sep -> [(String, c)] -> B.MixText
42mixTerms sep ts = mixJoin sep (f <$> ts) where
43    f (n, c) = mixTermName n `B.mixSep` B.mix c
44
45mixTermName :: String -> B.MixText
46mixTermName n = B.mixString ('/' : n)
47
48-- | Create judgement using mix text.
49--
50--  >>> mixJudge B.mix2 "AB" [("a", "foo"), ("b", "bar")]
51--  MixText "|-- AB  /a foo  /b bar"
52--
53mixJudge :: (B.Mix sep, B.Mix cl, B.Mix c) => sep -> cl -> [(String, c)] -> B.MixText
54mixJudge sep cl ts = B.mixString "|-- " <> B.mix cl <> B.mix sep <> mixTerms sep ts
55
